footer.tagline: Transform your fitness journey with gamified tracking

seo.defaultDescription: Gamified gym tracker with offline functionality, social features, and AI insights. Track workouts, earn XP, and connect with the fitness community.
seo.defaultKeywords: gym tracker,fitness app,workout tracker,gamified fitness,offline gym app,PWA fitness,social fitness,AI fitness,exercise database,workout gamification

homePage.title: LiftFire - Gamified Gym Tracker with Offline Support
homePage.description: Transform your fitness journey with LiftFire's gamified gym tracker. Features offline functionality, social challenges, AI insights, and 1000+ exercises. Start free today!

featuresPage.title: Features - LiftFire Gym Tracker
featuresPage.description: Discover LiftFire's powerful features: offline workout tracking, gamification system, social community, AI insights, and comprehensive exercise database.

pricingPage.title: Pricing - LiftFire Plans & Features
pricingPage.description: Choose your LiftFire plan: Free with basic features, Pro ($9.99/month) with cloud sync and social features, or Elite ($19.99/month) with AI coaching.

roadmapPage.title: Roadmap - LiftFire Development Timeline
roadmapPage.description: See what's coming to LiftFire: upcoming features, development milestones, and our long-term vision for the future of fitness tracking.
